basics.name: Poulami Sarkar
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: I am a student pursuing an undergraduate degree in PESIT Bangalore, in Computer Science and Engineering. I have one year of experience in back-end development . I am also familiar with in C, C++ and I am pursuing online courses in Machine Learning and JavaScript. I also have five years of working experience in electronics and I am familiar with Arduino programming. Moreover I am also familiar with the fundamental concepts of Linear Algebra.

location.address: L n T Southcity , C3 1801, Bannerghatta Road, Bangalore

work.summary: I have helped perform web scraping for a number of research projects

Theoretical Validation Of Potential Habitability Via Data Analytic And Boosted Tree Methods I have helped prove the model scalability. i.e showing that the global maxima holds even if the number of parameters are increased.

I am proficient in the basic concepts of electronics. And I am also familiar with working with arduino. Responsible for building, 1. Arduino controlled solar tracker using stepper motor 2. Line follower robot . This is a simple prototype that safely navigated along a predefined path. 3. Cold drink decanter/Wending machine

awards.title: CBSE Science Fair (Regional Level)
awards.summary: Generation Of Electricity From Piezoelectric Materials Developed a means of utilizing the stress exerted on the ground by trains to produce electricity . (using piezoelectric materials)
